title: Ethereum Cat Herders Meeting #113
body:
## Date and Time

July 18, 2023 at **14:00 UTC** [Please note the change of meeting time]

## Location 

Join Zoom Meeting
https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84834303064?pwd=YTVDNUxvSjEzL1VTOXNoNmI1a2RlZz09
Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A


## Agenda

New users on ECH Discord and/or contributor's introduction

### 1. Project Demo - [Octant](https://golem.foundation/2023/06/29/announcing-epoch-zero.html) with James K. 

### 2. Ethereum network upgrades
- [Cancun](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/cancun.md) & [Deneb](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/tree/dev/specs/deneb) upgrade
-   EIP-4844 Implementers call 24 [Recording](https://youtu.be/jQ86ItkOfm0) [Notes](https://twitter.com/terencechain/status/1668332513645977612), [Terence Tweet](https://twitter.com/terencechain/status/1668332513645977612) & [Readiness checklist](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/blob/master/Breakout-Room/4844-readiness-checklist.md)
  - Changes included in the Network Upgrade (Cancun)
    - [EIP-1153: Transient storage opcodes](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1153)
    - [EIP-4788: Beacon block root in the EVM](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-4788)
    - [EIP-4844: Shard Blob Transactions](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-4844)
    - [EIP-5656: MCOPY - Memory copying instruction](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-5656)
    - [EIP-6780: SELFDESTRUCT only in same transaction](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6780)
   - [Cancun Readiness checklist](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/cancun.md#readiness-checklist)
- Changes included in the Network Upgrade (Deneb)
   - [EIP-7044: Perpetually Valid Signed Voluntary Exits](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7044)
   - [EIP-7045: Increase max attestation inclusion slot ](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7045)

#### Useful resources
- Dencun upgrade [PEEPanEIP Playlist](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxpnKFDl1KzGOKqwux5JaLlv)


#### Other Protocol Development & Research
  - Verkle Implementers Call # 3 [Recording](https://youtu.be/IUJQbCLEZDM)
  - EOF Implementers Meeting [Recording 18](https://youtu.be/9csQJ3nQz98) 
  - [EOF Mega specs](https://notes.ethereum.org/@ipsilon/mega-eof-specification)


### 3. Events, Fellowship, Hackathon
- [Devconnect - Istanbul](https://blog.ethereum.org/2023/04/20/announcing-devconnect-ist) - November 13-19, 2023.
- Devconnect [Scholars Program](https://blog.ethereum.org/2023/06/26/devconnect-instanbul-scholars): Apply by July 23rd!

### 4. General updates/discussion
- ECH Stats.
    - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/EthCatHerders) - 6616 Followers
    - [Discord](https://discord.io/EthCatHerders) - 2090 users
    - [YouTube](https://studio.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A) - 3120 subscribers
    - [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/ethereum-cat-herders/) - 298 Followers
- ECH engineering
  - [ECH Website](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/) 
    - A page for [Dencun](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/dencun)    
- ECH Operations 
   - [YouTube Shorts](https://studio.youtube.com/playlist/PL4cwHXAawZxr020waJCI0dZAfPAW2naK1/videos)
     - PEEPanEIP shorts [Community Playlist](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxr020waJCI0dZAfPAW2naK1)
     - Splitting the ECH meeting video to create a general community update video and share it with the community
   - [ECH Podcast](https://open.spotify.com/show/7dgxKMkSyy3HWtQW7OfqXA)
- [EIPs Insight](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight) & [EIPsInsight website](https://eipsinsight.com) 
- [PEEPanEIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F)  
    - Upcoming meetings can be found on [PEEPanEIP schedule](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/projects/2)
- [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) and action items for ECH 
  - All Core Dev Execution [Notes 165](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/828)
  - All Core Dev Consensus [Notes 113](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/831)(https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/812/commits/c1a852e9647cdefcbcff6e47dba6d2fe5df1dccf)
  - EIPIP [meeting 85]
  - EIP Editing Office Hour Meeting 21 [Recording](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rsuY8ZA6VdQ&list=PL4cwHXAawZxqnDHxOyuwMpyt5s8F8gdmO) & Meeting 22 [Agenda](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/251)

### 5. New initiative/association
- Update ECH access
  - Twitter
- Contributors to send weekly Tweets or repost on social media to increase reach
- Any new ideas for community engagement?

### 6. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- Meeting [112]

#### The date for the next meeting is Aug 01, 2023

 (If anything else, leave a comment.)
